author: newmindflow
title: Trybbles Blockchain-Enabled AR Pets
description: Gaming will catapult Cardano to next levels of adoption, yet a large part of the gaming community is actively opposed to blockchain & NFTs.
solution: A fictional world w/ 2 initial releases: a traditional adventure game & a blockchain-enabled NFT-based experience, bridging the communities.
experience: New Mindflow: 30 years of combined experience in film, TV, apps & games production. Creators of 2 successful CNFT projects: Trybbles & Icons
